item.title: Da fawk
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:1, topic:332883”]if nobody comments i will remove!

[COLOR=red]Tested Base[/COLOR]: Pali
[COLOR=red]Difficulty[/COLOR]: 0\10 Mainly For New Players, And Still Preety Neat[/CENTER]

[B]Basicly, It Selects A random color, a random fact, and plays them back whatever you choose your interval to be. The Thing I like about it is it keeps it all in a nice class, to change and to add at your liking :p, so here we go!

[CENTER][COLOR=orange]Step 1: [COLOR=black]Go To Your Rs2>world folder[/COLOR], [COLOR=black]and create a file called[/COLOR] [COLOR=purple]RandomMessages.java[/COLOR] [/COLOR][COLOR=black]make sure you spell right~![/COLOR]
Place This in it (Change The Interval To Your Liking):[/CENTER]

package palidino76.rs2.world;
/*
 * Class RandomMessages
 * 
 * Sends Random Message's To Server Players
 *
 * Created by Erand
 */
import palidino76.rs2.player.Player;
import palidino76.rs2.util.Misc;
import palidino76.rs2.io.*;
 
public class RandomMessages {

Player p;

 public RandomMessages(Player p) {
     this.p = p;
 }

public int time = 0;
 /*
  *Set This To The Message Interval, 300 is reasonable
  */
public int interval = 300;
 
/*
 *The Messages ThemSelves You Can Add Or Remove =P
 */
String[] messages = {
"Did You Know If you die and have a freeze condition, you are still frozen for a few seconds.",  
"Did You Know That RFacts = Random FACTS?",
"Your Avatar dosen't have any fingers",
"The Duel Arena alone, is larger then the Tree Gnome Village with its maze",
"There are 3 ruins in Wilderness.",
"Every items' top is facing north when dropped.",
"There are only 10 magic trees in All And Runescape?.",
"Barrows brothers have Legend capes.",
"Bows and Granite Mauls are held in the wrong hand."
};

String[] getcolors = {
"<shad=0202><col=FFF000>", //YELLOW
"<shad=0202><col=FFFFF0>", //WHITE
"<shad=0202><col=0000FF>", //BLUE
"<shad=0202><col=FF0000>", //RED
"<shad=0202><col=0000>",   //BLACK
"<shad=0202><col=00FF00>", //GREEN
};
 
public void CountDown() {
   if(p.time == 0) {
   p.time = interval;
  }
 }
 
public void CreateMessage() {
   if(p.time == 120) {
    p.frames.sendMessage(p, getcolors[(int)(Math.random() * getcolors.length)]+"[RFact]"+ messages[(int)(Math.random() * messages.length)]);
    Misc.println("[RF]Sent A Message!");
  }
 }

public void process(Player p) {
  if (p == null) {
      return;
  }
  if (p.time > 0) {
              p.time--;  
  }
  CountDown();
  CreateMessage();
 }
}

[CENTER]Step 2: Making It Work Oo,
Go Find Player.java in Your [COLOR=seagreen]Players Folder[/COLOR]
Add This InPort[/CENTER]

import palidino76.rs2.world.RandomMessages;

Add ThisThis Int Under another int , Dont froget this step:

public int time = 0

[CENTER]Now Find [COLOR=red]public void process() { [/COLOR][COLOR=black]And Add This Right Under[/COLOR][/CENTER]

RandomMessages RM = new RandomMessages(this);
RM.process(this);

[CENTER]Compile And Your Done, =] Change The messages, add more up to u, hope u enjoyed!
Comment, And let me know how i did =P
lolking[/CENTER]

[CENTER][COLOR=purple]And For The Code’Usa User’s Heres a converted Version’ Thanks to Djaven[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#800080]Follow the steps’ just get the code from down here instead ![/COLOR][/CENTER]

 
package net.com.codeusa.world;
/*
 * Class RandomMessages
 * 
 * Sends Random Message's To Server Players
 *
 * Created by Erand
 */
import net.com.codeusa.model.Player;
import net.com.codeusa.util.Misc;
import net.com.codeusa.io.*;
 
public class RandomMessages {

    Player p;

    public RandomMessages(Player p) {
        this.p = p;
     }

     public int time = 0;

   /*
     *Set This To The Message Interval, 300 is reasonable
     */
     public int interval = 300;
 
   /*
    *The Messages ThemSelves You Can Add Or Remove =P
    */
    String[] messages =  {
      "Did You Know If you die and have a freeze condition, you are still frozen for a few seconds.",  
      "Did You Know.?",
      "Your Avatar dosen't have any fingers",
      "The Duel Arena alone, is larger then the Tree Gnome Village with its maze",
     "There are 3 ruins in Wilderness.",
      "Every items' top is facing north when dropped.",
     "There are only 10 magic trees in All And Runescape?.",
     "Barrows brothers have Legend capes.",
     "Bows and Granite Mauls are held in the wrong hand."
     };

    String[] getcolors = {
    "<shad=0202><col=FFF000>", //YELLOW
    "<shad=0202><col=FFFFF0>", //WHITE
    "<shad=0202><col=0000FF>", //BLUE
    "<shad=0202><col=FF0000>", //RED
    "<shad=0202><col=0000>",   //BLACK
    "<shad=0202><col=00FF00>", //GREEN
    };

    public void CountDown() {
        if(p.time == 0) {
            p.time = interval;
        }
   }
   public void CreateMessage() {
        if(p.time == 120) {
            p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, getcolors[(int)(Math.random() * getcolors.length)]+"[Server]"+ messages[(int)(Math.random() * messages.length)]);
            Misc.println("[RF]Sent A Message!");
        }
    }
    public void process(Player p) {
         if (p == null) {
             return;
         }
         if (p.time > 0) {
              p.time--;  
         }
        CountDown();
        CreateMessage();
     }
}
import net.com.codeusa.world.RandomMessages;
 public int time = 0

RandomMessages RM = new RandomMessages(this); RM.process(this);

[/quote]

item.title: Da fawk
item.dc:creator: @skepskep skepskep
item.description:
@skepskep wrote:

[code]package net.com.codeusa.world;
/*

  • Class RandomMessages
  • Sends Random Message’s To Server Players
  • Created by Erand
    /
    import net.com.codeusa.model.Player;
    import net.com.codeusa.util.Misc;
    import net.com.codeusa.io.    ;

public class RandomMessages {

private Player player;

public RandomMessages(Player player) {
	this.player = player;
}

private int elapsed = 0;

private final String[] messages =  {
	"Did You Know If you die and have a freeze condition, you are still frozen for a few seconds.",
	"Did You Know.?",
	"Your Avatar dosen't have any fingers",
	"The Duel Arena alone, is larger then the Tree Gnome Village with its maze",
	"There are 3 ruins in Wilderness.",
	"Every items' top is facing north when dropped.",
	"There are only 10 magic trees in All And Runescape?.",
	"Barrows brothers have Legend capes.",
	"Bows and Granite Mauls are held in the wrong hand."
};

private final int[] colors = { 0xFFF000, 0xFFFFF0, 0xFF, 0xFF0000, 0x0, 0xFF00 };

public void process() {
	if (elapsed++ % 120 == 0) {
		player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<shad=0202><col=" + colors[(int) (Math.random() * colors.length)] + ">[RFact]" + messages[(int) (Math.random() * messages.length)]);
		Misc.println("[RF]Sent A Message!");
	}
}

}[/code]

Fixed it up a little for you.
